notes.title: Data Availability Statement
notes.p: Plants of Lippia multiflora Moldenke were used in this study. All plant parts were identified by Samba, N. and Nelo, M. (University of Kimpa Vita, N’dalatando, Province of Cuanza Norte, Angola); Christin, H.; Mateus, D.F.D; Christoph, N. and Thea, L. (Faculty of Biology, Institute of Botany, Technische Universität Dresden, 01062, Dresden, Germany) in “Economic Potential of Selected Native Plants from Cuanza Norte, Northern Angola Mix study”. Collection and export permits were obtained from the Ministry of Environment Angola and the Province Government of Cuanza Norte and Zaire.
